entry.title: Night Shots
entry.content:
Oh the colors at night. I took my camera with me when going for a short shopping trip. I seem to have just missed the DHL guy bringing me my new Puma shoes (they didn't have my size in the shop.) by the way, but not that that matters. This is about the photos I took and they have only been marginally edited if that. Using a bit of underexposure on the camera was a good deal to get the dark colors out of the shots. So check out the Night Shots Set.

<a title="Photo Sharing" href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/oliver/108653756/"><img width="500" height="333" alt="The Opera Light" class="flickr-photo" src="http://static.flickr.com/53/108653756_6ba835ef28.jpg" /></a> <!-- technorati tags start -->

Technorati Tags: <a rel="tag" href="http://www.technorati.com/tag/350d">350d</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://www.technorati.com/tag/Canon">Canon</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://www.technorati.com/tag/Night%20Shots">Night Shots</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://www.technorati.com/tag/Tamron%2012-24">Tamron 12-24</a>

<!-- technorati tags end -->

entry.title: Industry Shots
entry.content:
I just had a great weekend with Thijs and among others we took a photo shoot around a few locations in cologne. Later Thijs gave me a bit of a deeper introduction to the art of editing RAW files with the likes of Adobe Lightroom (currently in Beta). I might have overdone it a little bit but here is a set of shots from some industry structures from the last days, all changed around in Lightroom for giving them just that little bit of kick, or making the speciality of the scenery clearer. Check it out on Flickr.

<img class="flickr-photo" src="http://static.flickr.com/42/105369385_dab7fbddf3.jpg">

entry.title: Thijs reviews Aperture
entry.content: <p>Thijs briefly reviews Aperture and likes what he sees. The RAW converter seems to be lacking a bit but I really presume this will be fixed soon, especially in a product this expensive. But it seems that if you are doing stuff with photos, you should take a look at this.</p> <p><!-- technorati tags start --> <p>Technorati Tags: rel="tag">Apple, rel="tag">Photography</p> <p><!-- technorati tags end --> </p>

entry.title: Back from Africa
entry.content: <p> We just arrived back from our Africa trip yesterday. One week of Safari in Tanzania followed by one week of beach and relaxation in Zanzibar. It was an amazing honeymoon and we have to thank all our friends who made the trip possible! I already created an Africa set on Flickr for you all to enjoy until I get back to a bit more regular posting. Lots of things to post about and lots of work to do now that I'm back, with the batteries fully loaded up again. Check out the set: </p> title="Africa Set"><img src="http://photos22.flickr.com/32935579_c195da65bd.jpg" width="500" height="333" alt="Oh the beauty" />
